noun.description: A key on a typewriter or computer keyboard that causes the carriage or cursor to move backward.
A device on a video recorder or camcorder which produces a slight backward run between shots to eliminate disturbance caused by the interruption of the scanning process.
examples: begin with a few seconds of static shot, remembering to allow for backspace time

verb.description: Move a typewriter carriage or computer cursor back one or more spaces.
